cause.description:
The American Cancer Society Relay For Life is a 24 hour event designed to honor those battling cancer, remember those lost, and to raise money in order to fund research to find a cure.
To find a Relay For Life event near you, please visit http://www.relayforlife.org.
All donations to this cause go directly to The American Cancer Society.
1. Cancer is a disease that is affecting millions of people each day.
2. Research funding is needed to find new treatments.
3. Education funding is needed to help patients in their battles.
4. We must step up to help the fight against Cancer.
cause.mission: Raise money for the American Cancer Society to help in the battle against cancer.
cause.name: ACS Relay For Life
